description: Silt-weave breeches in clay-umber linen-wool blend

core:description.text: Sturdy breeches of silt-weave cloth, a blend of linen and wool dyed the clay-umber color of riverbank mud. The weave is dense enough to shed light rain and resist snagging on dock timbers. Wide through the thigh for ease of movement, they taper below the knee where they can be tucked into boots or bound with wraps. The seat and knees show the wear of one who kneels and squats in labor.
